text: <@U351SSVMM> -  for Windows, my guess is that you need to install the Windows build tools - <https://github.com/felixrieseberg/windows-build-tools>  (note that you'll want to do the install in an elevated / admin shell)

attachments.title: felixrieseberg/windows-build-tools

text: As for Ubuntu, what happens if you type `make` in your shell?
